page.title: 01THE AREA AROUND AYMESTREY
page.content: This area is typical of the lovely North Herefordshire countryside which borders Wales. It lies some 20 miles North of Hereford and the nearest towns are{Leominster}8mls and{Ludlow 11mls. The A4110 which is part of an old Roman Road goes through the village of Amestrey and narrow lanes network the area joining the outlying farms and houses and the hamlets of { {Yatton,Covenhope,Lower Lye}and the small village of{Lucton.} Hills,woods,pastures,the{River Lugg and the abundance of footpaths make it a popular and pleasant area for walking and enjoying a peaceful country holiday, accommodation being provided by the Crown Inn and several 'holiday cottages' scattered through the area.
